The bitcontrol® Digital TV Link
provides a JScript interface, that allows a remote c... The constant DTVLink inside the script represents the filter and allows the readout an...... The access to the plug-ins takes place with help of the name and via the DTVLink a... The functions Load and Unload are used to load or to unload a plug-in. Th... The functions Start and Stop are used to start or to stop a plug-in. The ...The following chapter lists only the methods that are provided by the plug-in. Furthermore ...The following methods or variables are usable: ...The following methods and variables are usable: ...The following methods or variables are usable: ...The following methods or variables are usable: ...The following methods or variables are usable: ...The plug-in combines the formerly HTTP server and RTSP server and contains the Media Sessions ...The following methods or variables are usable: ......The Multistream Server plug-in allows the access to bitcontrol® Decoder....... Get requests can be used to read out information from bitcontrol® Digital TV Link ... Returns the version of the used bitcontrol® Digital TV Link

These JScript snippets are used to get information about the plug-in states of a bitcontrol® Digi...Each of these JScript snippets return the state of a bitcontrol® Digital TV Link preference option....Returns the state of the Video Output Pin / Audio Output Pin option...Returns the Id and the name of the currently used Video Decoder / Audio Decoder...Returns some format values of the currently used Video Decoder / Audio Decoder...Returns the Renderer buffering time...Returns the contents of the FOURCC mapping table...Returns the Id of the currently set Preffered media language...Returns a list of all available Video Decoder / Audio Decoder...If Get Storage is used with default settings, the snippit response will be the same as Get StorageF...Returns the name of the Storage file....Returns the content of the bitcontrol® Digital TV Link configuration file (DTVLink.xml)...Returns the path to the scenario file...Returns the state of the Save Log option...Returns the path to the log file...If the bitcontrol® Digital TV Link Options dialogues / console / systray icon are open or visible, ...For this the value true (open) or true (close) can be set....Returns the channels of all started plug-ins and their properties...Returns statistical values of the channel the is currently in use......Returns the available transponders...Returns the available transponders and their channels......Returns the state of the plug-ins...This JScript Snippit allows the creation of an own plug-in.
